title: REMODELED Luxury 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom- Mark 1 Apartments
posting_body: Welcome to the Mark 1 Apartments!
We offer beautiful lavish floor plans to fit all your needs and beautiful lifestyle!
**UNDER NEW AND IMPROVED MANAGEMENT**
Located in South Las Vegas one of the most desirable neighborhoods.
We are conveniently located just minutes from the famed Las Vegas Strip, off Desert Inn Road & Paradise.
Where all the opportunities are never ending with the wonderful fine dining and many entertainment shows to end the night or get started.

Our beautiful homes offer stainless steel all electric appliances with an amazing breakfast bar for all your family and friends to enjoy time together, Spacious living rooms and bedrooms to make your home YOU!
Surrounded by all of the Las Vegas area you get surreal beautiful views to enjoy.
We offer central A/C and heating, an enchanting 24 hour pool with jacuzzi, underground parking facility and ADA accessible with our elevators.
Each floor is equipped with a washer and dryer in building and trash chutes within walk distance for your convenience.
Call today to find out more about our wonderful community and schedule a tour!!
1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom 850 Sq Ft
Rent $1,550.00- STRIP VIEW HOME!!!
COME TOUR YOUR NEW HOME TODAY!!
PLEASE BRING ID UPON ARRIVAL
Mark 1 Apartments
